website_summaries.verdict: Perfect for a dining room or game room.
pros: A quality-built wooden chandelier that can tie a room together
We love its wood frame and adjustable height
cons: Assembly is challenging, and some customers reported missing screws

customer_reviews.title: It's missing hardware
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this lighting system but the hardware was incomplete. I contacted the manufacturer and they were wonderful. We told them what was missing and it was sent to us in just 3 days. I love that we could adjust the height on the poles. It is a perfect addition to our kitchen. It was easy as well to install.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Odom Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty. Rustic.
customer_reviews.text: One of the glass sconces was broken upon arrival despite the sufficient packaging. The seller put another in the mail immediately. Beautiful piece and easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: EAC

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, rustic light!
customer_reviews.text: Finally had an electrician install this light for us. We put it over our island. I absolutely love it. It puts off more lighting than the single canned light we had before though it casts lots of shadows but I will get used to that. I am using bright white bulbs and not the warm vintage style even though those look prettier IMO. I just like a lot of light especially in the kitchen. Now I want a similar one, just not exactly to put over my kitchen table! If you are going for a rustic look, this is it. BTW, if you have vaulted ceilings, it comes with joints that allow it to hang straight down.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Rustic-Chic
customer_reviews.text: I used this as a dining room light and it’s beautiful. It has a rustic-chic look to it and the assembly with installation took my husband a little over an hour. My only complaint is that one of the lights was crooked, but with a little elbow grease my husband was able to straighten it.
customer_reviews.author: v jennings

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as the pictures
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty rinky dink little fixture. Maybe for $59.99 but hemp ropes? More like heavy twine. I’m looking for something rustic but this is not it. Not nearly as imposing as the pictures indicate - I am amazed that it received such glowing reviews. Can't be real.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Mills

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous piece! We bought 2. The larger one for kite band smaller for dining
customer_reviews.author: Levi Brown

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Picture was very deceiving, quality not what I expected a waste of my money and very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Sapanaro

customer_reviews.title: Looks great!
customer_reviews.text: It's a little flimsy, but we really like the look in our kitchen. Not too difficult to put together, but not for the novice.
customer_reviews.author: Juice

customer_reviews.title: One of the screw ins for the bulbs is broken ...
customer_reviews.text: One of the screw ins for the bulbs is broken. Really hard to put together. The instructions are awful and skip steps.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Part missing.
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived l missing a part so I could not install. Took 3 weeks to receive placement part.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Morgan

product_meta.title: LALUZ Chandeliers, Dining Room Lighting Fixtures Hanging in Rustic Wood & Black Metal Finish with Hemp-Rope & 3 Clear Glass Shades, Vintage Pendant for Kitchen Island, Foyer
feature_bullets: [FARMHOUSE PENDANT LIGHTING FOR KITCHEN ISLAND] – Classic and rustic kitchen island lighting, the three cylindrical clear glass shades of this foyer chandelier provide just the right amount of light for farmhouse style places while the real natural wooden frame with hemp ropes are appealing them.

[SUPER EASY INSTALLATION] - Necessary mounting hardware to connect to the junction box was included. If you have basic home wiring knowledge about standard positive/negative wires, the installation of the country chandelier for dining room will be quite easy for you.
[ADJUSTABLE HEIGHT TO FIT YOUR HOME] - Being equipped with 2 *20" rods, 2 * 12" rods, 2 * 8" rods, it is easy for you to lower the farmhouse pendant light if it was hung too high.

[PERFECT SIZE & VARIOUS CEILINGS] - 10. 2" * 1" Rectangle Canopy; 2 *20" rods, 2 * 12" rods, 2 * 8" rods; 24"L * 10. 6"H * 10. 2"H Dining Chandelier Body; The hanging kitchen island light comes with joints that allow it to hang straight down from all kinds of ceilings, including flat, sloped and slanted ones.
[ADDITIONAL INFORMATION] - This rustic island lighting requires 3 * E26 Base max 60W Bulbs (Needs to order separately). The farm style light fixture also works with dimmer switch.
